name: PARA-SITE
description:
Everything looks fine until you picked up your laptop and stared into the opposite world through the web cam. Bugs, bugs everywhere! 

By using your laptop's webcam, investigate the room and eliminate all the bugs with your spray that are causing the glitches to progress to the next level! 

My time for the run is: 4m 25s, and I used 82.69 unit of bug spray. 

If you make it through, please let me know your time and spray use! 

Controls:

[Grip] to pick up laptop

[Trigger] of none laptop hand to use the bug spray

[L Joystick] to move

[R Joystick] to snap turn

Recommend facing the laptop and try to spray the bugs behind you around your shoulder, neck, around your waist perhaps, as expected, everything will be opposite due to the mirror'd camera. Good luck! 

Oculus Quest, Oculus PC only.
